quest.name: Worth Fighting For
journal: Jenlyns has something─or someone─on his mind.

You learn from Jenlyns that something appears to be troubling Mylla of late. As a close friend of the First Sword, the paladin encourages you to seek her out and inquire after the source of her consternation.

Speaking with Mylla, you learn that it is none other than Aldis, recently returned to Ul'dah, who is causing her grief. Before she can go into detail, however, the man himself appears. Having explained that he has been to the Far East to train in the way of the samurai, he challenges you to a duel for old times' sake. The stage is set for Scorpion Crossing in western Thanalan, and you set out to join Aldis there.

You and Aldis square off. As he prepares to draw his blade, however, a look of awe sweeps over his face. To simply confront you, it would seem, is enough to convince him that he is no match for you, and he abruptly abandons the duel and excuses himself. His uncharacteristic behavior leaves Mylla at a loss for words, and she turns her steps back to the Gladiators' Guild, more confounded than when she left.

Eventually joining you and Mylla, Aldis apologizes for his behavior. Having thought long and hard on the reason for your strength, he has finally come to realize that which is dearest to him: the Gladiators' Guild. To that end, Aldis declares that he will give up the itinerant life and henceforth remain in Ul'dah to watch over the guild. Though Mylla appears none too impressed by his presumptuousness, you know that, deep down, she is glad for his presence. Thus do you take your leave, assured in the knowledge that all will be well in the end.

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: Ah, if it isn't Forename. How fare you, my friend? Still keeping up your training, I trust?

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: The Sultansworn have not been idle either. Seeking ways to better serve our nation, we have joined hands with the Gladiators' Guild.

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: We train with one another, helping to hone each other's sword arms. The guild even dispatches its members to assist us in guarding the palace.

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: None of this would have been possible without First Sword Mylla's cooperation. She is a dedicated woman─dedicated to her art and to her own─and I have the utmost respect and admiration for her.

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: ...So it was with deep concern that I noticed that something troubles her of late. Whereas before she was amiable, she has become given to brooding silences.

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: I considered offering to lend an ear, but as a relatively new acquaintance, I did not wish to appear overly familiar.

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: But you, Forename─you are her close friend. Will you not seek her out and inquire after the source of her consternation?

dialogue.name: JENLYNS
dialogue.text: As I mentioned, something seems to be troubling First Sword Mylla of late. If you have a moment, pray seek her out and inquire after the source of her consternation.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: ...Oh, it's you, Forename. It's been a while. What brings you here today?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Jenlyns is worried about you.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Is everything all right?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: H-He is? Gods, was I being that obvious? <sigh> Forgive me, I don't mean to sound ungrateful. It's kind of Jenlyns to worry about me.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Wh-What's this all of a sudden? Of course I'm─ <sigh> Nay, I won't insult your intelligence by lying to you.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: You see, it's Aldis... He's returned to Ul'dah. He's been pardoned, so he has every right to be here.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: But it's just...I just don't understand what's going through his mind.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: (-???-)Oho, if it isn't the very womanman I've been longing to see!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Greetings, Forename! You look well─for someone who's been raising hells the world over!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: ...Hm? I see my attire intrigues you.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: When I took my leave after the Ul Cup, I believe I said something to the effect of still having much to learn. That's what I've been doing─learning.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: I remembered hearing tell of the fearsome swordsmen of the Far East. And so I decided to journey there and train in their style.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: I remembered the elderly samurai who was making short work of our gladiators. And so I decided to journey to the Far East and train in his style.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: You never cared for convention or tradition. Is it any wonder we're confused to see you actually look the part?

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Hah, I suppose you're right. But you have to admit, Mylla─I look pretty good in this.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: So, Forename. How about you and I have a bout? For old times' sake?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Gladly!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Heh heh, we're of a kind, you and I. When we see a mighty foe, we can't resist the urge to test ourselves!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Not wont to bare steel needlessly, is that it? But I know you need this, Forename─as much as I do. We're of a kind, you and I. When we see a mighty foe, we can't resist the urge to test ourselves!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Now, as much as I fancy a rematch in the Coliseum, we'll have to settle for a humbler venue this time. Hmmm, let's see...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: How about Scorpion Crossing, outside of the Gate of the Sultana? There's space there, if not a lot of people to watch our glorious match.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Oh, don't you even think about fighting in the city!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: If you must feed your vanity, I'll attend as witness. At the very least, I can explain the situation to the Brass Blades should they appear.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Thanks, I appreciate it.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: And there you have it, Forename. I'll see you at Scorpion Crossing.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: <sigh> I can't believe this... Go on ahead, Forename. I'll follow in a moment.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I hope he's satisfied.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Heh heh, I've been looking forward to this. Come, my friend, let's begin!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Impossible...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: How? How did you become so strong?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I found something worth protecting...

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: I found something I couldn't bear to lose...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: You journeyed to another world...and found something you wished to protect?

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: You journeyed to another world...and found something you couldn't bear to lose?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Aldis? What's the meaning of this?

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: There's no point. As I am, I don't stand a chance against Forename.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: You would admit defeat before you've even fought?

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: It's unseemly, aye. But because of my training, I've come to know, Mylla─come to know the power of resolve and the difference it makes.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Forgive me, I need a moment alone.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: This isn't the Aldis I know. He's never once backed down from a fight.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I don't doubt that you've grown stronger since last we met.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: But so has Aldis. That's why he challenged you─to put his training to the proof.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Yet, by that selfsame training, he could see that he was no match for you. I...I don't know what to say.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Well, there's no use pondering things here. Let's return to the guild.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Aldis hasn't returned.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: I wouldn't be surprised if he's left Ul'dah again. It wouldn't be the first time he's disappeared as quickly as he's arrived...

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Don't blame yourself. The problem is Aldis's and Aldis's alone. It's up to him to resolve it, however long that may take.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: At any rate, don't feel compelled to linger on his account. I'm sure you have much demands on your time. Come and visit again when you have the chance.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Sorry for taking off like that.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Truth be told, I'm ashamed to show my face, but there's something I needed to tell you.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: After I left, I thought long and hard on your words. On that which you said made you strong.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: It led me to ask myself, what is it that I wish to protect?

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: And you found your answer?

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Aye, I did. Fool that I am, it took me a long time, but I finally realized that it was always close by.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Aldis...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Mylla. This is embarrassing for me to say, but that which is dearest to me, that I cannot bear to lose...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: ...Is the Gladiators' Guild.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: ...What?

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: The old guildmaster, he was as a father to me. And this place is as a home.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: No matter where my path may lead, the guild will always welcome me with open arms. I realize that now.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Aldis! You...you...!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: So, if I'm to protect the guild, it means...well, you know...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: It means...I have to be at the guild. So from today, I'm giving up the itinerant life.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: After all these years coming and going as you please, sending nary a word, you think you can just stay here!? You've got a lot of nerve!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Why, Mylla, if I didn't know better, I'd say you were worried about me.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Sh-Shut your mouth! If you wish to stay, then do as you like! That's what you're good at!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Ah, there's the grimace I know and love. There truly is no place like home.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: But jests aside... Forename─because of you, I've finally realized what's important to me.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: For that, I give you my thanks.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: From hereon, I'll watch over the guild while I continue honing my skills.

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Who knows? If I work hard, I might even become the First Sword one day.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Not on your life! No one would entrust the guild to a selfish bastard such as you! And skills or no, you're starting from the bottom like the rest!

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: Aye, aye, whatever you say...

dialogue.name: ALDIS
dialogue.text: It was good seeing you, my friend. Do come and visit again. From now on, you know where to find me.
